    • Constructor Detail

      • GameInfo

        public GameInfo​(int chosenHole)
        Constructed by view, contains information about which hole has been chosen.
        Parameters:
        chosenHole - chosen hole for sowing

      • GameInfo

        public GameInfo​(boolean gameEnded)
        Constructed by view when user prematurely ends game
        Parameters:
        gameEnded - true when the game is over

      • GameInfo

        public GameInfo​(int[] marbleCounts,
                boolean[] activeStates,
                boolean turnChanged,
                int playerWithTurn,
                boolean gameEnded)
        Constructed by model, contains information about current game state
        Parameters:
        marbleCounts - array of hole marble counts based on index
        activeStates - array of hole states based on index
        turnChanged - true if the turn has changed
        playerWithTurn - player with turn
        gameEnded - true if the game is over

      • getPlayerWithTurn

        public int getPlayerWithTurn()
        Returns:
        1 if player1 has the turn, 2 for player2

      • getGameEnded

        public boolean getGameEnded()
        Returns:
        true if the game is over

      • isEarly

        public boolean isEarly()
        Returns:
        true if a player quit the game early

      • didQuit

        public boolean didQuit()
        Returns:
        return true if the other player quit the game

      • setQuit
